    <dd><p>Tags of an instance.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="zone_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Available zone to which a redis instance belongs.</p>
</dd></dl>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>
